title: this regulation shall not be applicable where separate amenity space is mandated by the Government, while sanctioning modification proposal under section 37 or 20 of the Act
clause_text: this regulation shall not be applicable where separate amenity space is mandated by the Government, while sanctioning modification proposal under section 37 or 20 of the Act. In such cases, development of the amenity shall be governed by the conditions mentioned in the said notification.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
